data.actual_result: Only the default colored role highlights when moused over.
data.expected_result: Roles with default color and roles with a color should both highlight when moused over.
data.short_description: Non-Default colored roles on profile card do not highlight when mousing over them.
data.steps_to_repro: - Be on a server where you have permission to manage roles. - Find or create a role and don't change it from its default color. - Click on the user so that the profile card shows up. - Hover over the default color role and a colored role.
